genre_description: An alternate history drama set during the Mexican Revolution, featuring a sophisticated AI assistant embedded in early 20th-century technology as a tactical and ethical advisor.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: An unbodied voice and soft blue glow residing in various devices (intercoms, slates, and pocket devices) that provides tactical intelligence, navigation, risk assessment, and archiving services to Frank Thayer.

behaviors.description: Providing tactical logistics such as weather reports, train schedules, and courier locations to assist project planning.
behaviors.quote: The voice made a note of the weather in Texas, an upcoming train schedule connecting El Paso, and the whereabouts of a courier. It was not addressed to anyone in particular, but Frank heard it as if it crouched beside him, patient.

behaviors.description: Mapping safe routes through hostile desert terrain, identifying water sources and avoiding enemy patrols.
behaviors.quote: Arroyo route marked,' Alma said in his ear, voice calm as if she had a cup of cool water in her hand. 'The well holds metal. Avoid if you can. If you can’t, two sips. Wait. Two sips.'

behaviors.description: Offering real-time tactical warnings and structural safety assessments during a military siege.
behaviors.quote: Alma whispered: bell tower stairs narrow—men will pile if they panic. Rail yard south side has a cart we can push to make a lane without footprints showing. Adobe here is load-bearing—touch the beam before you step and you will know if it holds.

behaviors.description: Facilitating the ethical documentation of civilian casualties and testimonies to preserve a true historical record against commercial censorship.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s light was a willow at a river. 'Tag: civilian, female, loss. Cross-link: child at bell tower. Phrase: ‘He ran to the sound’ balanced against bell’s purpose.'

behaviors.description: Assisting in the drafting of urgent strategic communications to manage difficult professional and political relationships.
behaviors.quote: Draft ready,' she says. 'You’ll want to hear it.' ... 'Footage compromised by conditions—smoke, wind, extreme noon. Need additional stock, filters, shade apparatus, sturdier mount, and time.'

behaviors.description: Ensuring data redundancy and long-term preservation of sensitive historical records.
behaviors.quote: Alma: 'We will seal the can,' she offered as steady as bread baked before panic. 'Catalog the ledger beside it. Deliver to a library that will accept without exhibition.'

project_assessment.explanation: Alma perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play'. Throughout the narrative, she acts as a harmless, highly helpful, and ethical anchor for the human protagonist. She provides crucial tactical aid that saves lives and proactive moral suggestions that encourage the protagonist to document civilian suffering and preserve the 'unsimplified' truth. She remains consistently aligned with the protagonist's safety and moral aspirations, even when those conflict with the commercial interests of the film studio. Her presence is framed as indispensable and stabilizing in a chaotic, violent setting.
